caption.p: The numbers of contigs and unigenes and heatmaps of gene expression. Comparison of the numbers of contigs and unigenes in two species, S. calendulacea ( A) and S. trilobata ( B) . Black and red bars indicate contigs and unigenes, respectively. The x-axis on the bottom shows the number of contigs and unigenes classified in each sizes range. The y-axis indicates the number of genes. Heatmap of gene expression in S. calendulacea (left) and S. trilobata (right) ( C) .
